title: Survival horror music
description: Music pack for horror, survival horror and adventure games
longDescription:
"Survival horror music" is a music pack for horror, survival horror, zombie, sci-fi, adventure, and other scary games. The music is all made to perfectly fit different scenes in a game. The pack contains 14 music tracks and 16 stinger tracks (game over, scare and solved puzzle).


Listen to a short excerpt of all music loops HERE

Check out the full version of all tracks including stingers HERE


Track list:

- Main theme 1 (03:16)

- Main theme 2 (loop) (01:01)

- Main theme 3 (loop) (01:29)

- Attack/danger 1 (loop) (01:25)

- Attack/danger 2 (loop) (01:50)

- Attack/danger 3 (loop) (02:02)

- Relief 1 (loop) (01:59)

- Relief 2 (loop) (01:59)

- Tension 1 (loop) (02:07)

- Tension 2 (loop) (02:30)

- Tension 3 (loop) (02:13)

- Tension 4 (loop) (01:42)

- Tension 5 (loop) (03:18)

- Tension 6 (loop) (02:45)


Stingers:

- Game over 1 (00:11)

- Game over 2 (00:11)

- Game over 3 (00:06)

- Scare 1 (00:04)

- Scare 2 (00:06)

- Scare 3 (00:08)

- Scare 4 (00:05)

- Scare 5 (00:05)

- Scare 6 (00:05)

- Scare 7 (00:07)

- Scare 8 (00:06)

- Scare 9 (00:15)

- Solved puzzle 1 (00:08)

- Solved puzzle 2 (00:05)

- Solved puzzle 3 (00:04)

- Solved puzzle 4 (00:03)


No need to credit me if you have bought the music pack. Contact me on contact@haakondavidsen.com if you have questions or would like me to make an original soundtrack for your game.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  14 loopable music tracks
  •  16 short stingers for game over, scares and solved puzzle


Number of Audio Wavs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 31 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XlgWyCbsWc7lQ0GGjCeGyWXcF1FWVOjc/view?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes: Contact me on contact@haakondavidsen.com if you have questions
